member.name: %add
member.summary: Returns addition of x and y
member.param: Integer value, double value or string
Integer value, double value or string
member.returns: The sum of two input numbers, or the concatenation of two strings

member.name: %sub
member.summary: Returns subtraction of x minus y
member.returns: Result of the y input subtracted from the x input

member.name: %mul
member.summary: Returns multiplication of x times y
member.returns: The product of the two input numbers

member.name: %div
member.summary: Returns division of x over y

member.name: %eq
member.summary: Compares if x and y are equal
member.param: Basic type object to compare (e.g. bool, int, double, string, etc.)
Basic type object to compare (e.g. bool, int, double, string, etc.)

member.name: %ge
member.summary: Compares if x is greater or equals to y
member.returns: True if x is equal or greater than y, false if not

member.name: %gt
member.summary: Compares if x is greater than y
member.returns: True if x is greater than y, false if not

member.name: %mod
member.summary: Modulo: Finds the remainder of x/y
member.returns: Remainder of the x input after being divided by the y input

member.name: %le
member.summary: Compares if x is lower or equal to y

member.name: %lt
member.summary: Compares if x is lower to y

member.name: %and
member.param: A boolean to check if true
Another boolean to check if true

member.name: %or
member.param: Other boolean to check if true
member.returns: True if any of the inputs are true

member.name: %nq
member.summary: Returns true if the two values are different

member.name: %Not
member.summary: Negates the input, e.g. returns false when the input is true.
